the ‚ÄòWorld Scholars Cup‚Äô Global Finals held at Yale University competing against 1000‚Äôs of students from schools across 40 countries International School Welcome to Sunmarke School A Passionately Character-Building & Innovative School in the Middle East Sunmarke provides an ambitious and inspiring values-based education nurturing the hearts and minds of young boys and girls so that they can flourish and achieve their dreams. Simply put, we transform young lives. Powered by our unique, leading-edge Signature Programmes, we are an incredibly innovative school reshaping and inspiring tomorrow‚Äôs generation. We are amongst the top 5 schools in Dubai, as seen by our outstanding IB and A-Level results, top university placements, and notable student achievements in the arts, sports, and extracurriculars. We are a recognised global leader in Positive Education ‚Äì a paradigm shift in education worldwide ‚Äì where it‚Äôs increasingly acknowledged that truly outstanding teaching and learning is only attained by developing ‚Äúacademic and personal excellence‚Äù as well as ‚Äúwell-being and character‚Äù. We are one of the few schools in the UAE to offer both the IB and A-Level curriculum pathways, as well as the BTECs. Backed by Fortes Education‚Äôs rich history of over 40 years in academia, Sunmarke is rated ‚ÄúOutstanding‚Äù by the British School Overseas Inspection Authority and ‚ÄúVery Good‚Äù by KHDA. Our Purpose We aim to inspire young boys and girls to thrive and flourish with purpose. A Rigorous & Ambitious Education We deliver an education that emphasises academic excellence and participation in diverse sports, performing arts and extracurricular activities. Outstanding Senior Leaders & Teachers Our educators are ambassadors of Positive Education and inspirational teachers. 40 Years of History Sunmarke School is backed by Fortes Education‚Äôs four decades of excellence in education Nursery Ages 45 days to 3 years EYFS Ages 3 to 5 years Primary Ages 5 to 11 years Secondary Ages 11 to 16 years Sixth Form Ages 16 to 18 years Sunmarke - Pathway to Top Universities Top University Destinations Sunmarke‚Äôs Unique & Leading-edge Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Students become creative problem-solvers through hands-on projects in coding, robotics, AI, 3D printing, and sustainable design, developing critical thinking, collaboration, and innovative solutions with real-world impact. Learn more Environment & Sustainability Students develop eco-leadership through outdoor learning, gardens, and real-world experiences, gaining sustainability skills, respect for nature, and the ability to drive positive environmental change in communities. Learn more University & Career Readiness The University & Career Readiness Programme empowers students with personalised guidance, internships, global engagement, and career counselling, equipping them with skills, confidence, and clarity for future success. Learn more Pro Sports Academy Sunmarke‚Äôs Pro Sports Academy develops athletes through elite coaching, 100+ squads, and global competitions, integrating fitness, nutrition, and resilience for lifelong excellence, discipline, and success beyond sport. Learn more Positive Education Internationally recognised for its holistic approach, the school blends wellbeing, character development, and Positive Psychology, nurturing resilient, empathetic, confident learners who thrive academically, socially, and emotionally. Learn more Global Language Programme The Global Languages Programme immerses students in Hindi and Mandarin, fostering communication, cultural awareness, empathy, and adaptability through storytelling, projects, traditions, and real-life experiences for global readiness. Learn more Financial Literacy The programme equips students with practical financial skills, ethical investment habits, and entrepreneurial thinking through interactive learning, fostering confidence, critical thinking, and responsible decision-making in real-world financial contexts. Learn more Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Sunmarke‚Äôs Enterprise & Mini-MBA empowers Years 10‚Äì13 with business, leadership, and innovation skills through workshops, mentorship, and industry exposure, preparing resilient future leaders and entrepreneurs. Learn more Communications, Media & the Performing Arts A dynamic programme combining drama, media, film, and communication, building confidence, creativity, and critical thinking through storytelling, performance, collaboration, and industry workshops from EYFS to Year 13. Learn more Excellent Academic Results 2024-25 0 IBDP AVERAGE POINTS SCORE more than 6 points above the world average 0 % IBDP RESULTS students exceeding the world average 0 % IBDP RESULTS students exceeding 35+ points 0 % IBDP RESULTS more than one in four students achieved 40+ points 0 % A-LEVEL & BTEC RESULTS 100% student pass rate at A-Level & BTEC 0 % A-LEVEL A*- C BTEC D*-M 0 % A-LEVEL A*- B BTEC D*-D 0 % A-LEVEL A*- A BTEC D* 0 % GCSE RESULTS 100% student pass rate at GCSE 0 % GCSE 9-4 (A*- C) including English & Maths 0 % GCSE 9-6 (A*- B) 0 % GCSE 9-7 (A*- A) Sunmarke - Launchpad to Future Success Our Summer Workplace Internships for Students Parent Testimonials ‚Äú My daughter has discovered an incredible passion for media over the last 2 years under the coaching of the teachers here at Sunmarke. Mrs Rebekah Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Seeing our daughter excel right from understanding pre-production, production to post-production, we absolutely love Sunmarake School. Mrs Nandita Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Today‚Äôs experience has been really valuable for me, appreciating just how well the science, technology, arts, and mathematical elements come together. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú I‚Äôd like to say thank you to Sunmarke that you have such a perfect opportunity to have this experience with our kids. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú I‚Äôm super happy for my daughter that has the opportunity to make experiments, and prototypes, try something, and create something. It‚Äôs amazing for every child. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú It‚Äôs great to see how they want to develop kids more with the creative mind in the STEAM Programme. We loved it. We are looking forward to more! Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú We are very happy to come today. I think it‚Äôs a very nice experience for both the kids and the parents‚Ä¶it‚Äôs amazing. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú Our children are growing up as future citizens of the world, and they are super happy and enthusiastic to go to school every day. Emily Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú I am genuinely impressed with everything that the kids are exposed to here at Sunmarke School. Also, immensely thankful for everything that the school is providing them. Sherif Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú What I like about Sunmarke is its environment and sustainability programme, as it raises children‚Äôs awareness about the world. Christina & Mike Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Sunmarke is the best school choice for us because my daughter is very happy to go to school every day. As a parent, I am highly satisfied with the quality of education provided here at Sunmarke School, as I can witness my daughter‚Äôs consistent progress and improvement each day. Tetiana Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú I am really impressed with the STEAM programme they have here at Sunmarke. Moreover, my kids have the opportunity to explore and learn about environmental and sustainability programme as well. I am very thankful for all the opportunities Sunmarke is providing for my kids. Leandra Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Sunmarke School is truly amazing. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for more. It‚Äôs been the perfect school for my son. Saireh Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú As a family, we have travelled a lot and our children have attended the top schools in the world. I can confidently say Sunmarke is amongst the top schools. It‚Äôs competitive both in academics and sports and offers a wide range of extracurriculars. The school keeps surprising us with its innovative programs and yet never forgets the heart and soul of the child. Pillaar Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú We have been at Sunmarke from the beginning and have seen our children grow into character-strong, confident young adults. They are well-balanced, have a strong sense of values, and approach each day with a sense of gratitude. Honestly, as parents, we could not have asked for more. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú This is a fantastic school. We have been here for 5 years and our kids are really, really happy. The school is a home away from home. The teachers are really what make a difference ‚Äì passionate about teaching, the children, and dynamic practitioners. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú I was blown away and super impressed with Sunmarke‚Äôs STEAM programme where multiple classes such as science, technology and computing, math, art and media, and design technology are collapsed into one massive lab which the school calls SPACE-X (in nod to Elon Musk himself). STEAM is interwoven across the whole curriculum. Sunmarke takes the learning journey to the next level. My son is always very excited about STEAM. Sunmarke‚Äôs teaching style has lifted his critical thinking skills, enabling him to find solutions to real-life problems. Rasha Khalil Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Sunmarke is not just about the regular staple diet of education schools give. It goes way beyond anything we have experienced. My child, Alfa, has benefited tremendously with the school‚Äôs various signature programmes, such as the Forest School and the STEAM programme. During our visit to the school‚Äôs STEAM showcase, Alfa, my child mentioned, showed what he had created with great interest. As parents we were fascinated by his learning journey, how he took the concept of catapult studied in Stone Age man to a full blown model with all the ways the catapult was used in hunting for food. Sunmarke encapsulates real and practical learning and engagement at its best. Mrs. Breman Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú My son‚Äôs learning from Sunmarke‚Äôs unbelievably creative Signature Programmes has been the hallmark of his growth at school. He has grown to have a real love for Nature and truly cares about conservation, all learned through Sunmarke‚Äôs Forest School programme. At Sunmarke‚Äôs STEAM programme and Space-X, he tinkers, ideates and tries, fails, and tries and finally successfully makes products and solutions, learning perseverance and the patience that even if you fail, always keep trying till you succeed. Marianne Boushra Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Children truly learn when they have fun and that is exactly what Sunmarke achieves daily in and out of the classroom. My child has shown his immense excitement about STEAM and constantly updates me about the progress of his projects. I love being able to see my child express his work and his learning journey. He is engaged, involved, and passionate, and he looks forward to going to school every day. Nura Al Gaddah Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Sunmarke is an amazing school for students of all ages, with its state of the art campus, well behaved students, qualified faculty and efficient admin team. That‚Äôs when we decided to enrol our child in the IB curriculum. It‚Äôs been a great experience for us as parents. Anita Isaac Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Focuses on the individual. Mutual respect. Building a genuine relationship with child and parent. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú Happy to have my daughter in this amazing school. Ahlam Bounaim Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Great school to learn and play. The teacher and assistant are all benevolent with children. Virginie Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú The most important thing about Sunmarke is the fact that it is a school that listens positively and take prompt action and my child‚Äôs progress is its number one priority. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú My elder son is in primary at Sunmarke School. We are really happy with the curriculum here and all the Signature programmes offered especially Performing Arts where my son got the opportunity to showcase his talent. Okesia Panina Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Beside the impressive facilities and very strong academic track record, the school is remarkable in ensuring it‚Äôs ‚Äòpositive education‚Äô philosophy is lived and breathed every day. Far from being just a tag line applied by a marketeer, the pastoral care and support for the children is second to none. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú My children at Sunmarke are extremely happy with the environment and the encouragement that‚Äôs being provided by the teachers. Its indeed commendable for a friendly atmosphere where all the kids are provided platform to showcase their potential. Sheeba Suresh Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú No bullying policy, positive education, good teachers and organization. Parent Sunmarke School ‚Äú Sunmarke‚Äôs education is beyond compare ‚Äì strong academics, a caring atmosphere, attention to every child, and a wide range of extracurricular and sports activities. Our children and us as a family have been extremely happy with Sunmarke. Pillaar Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú At Sunmarke, my daughter has grown into a young adult with a strong sense of values and character. She excels in her academics, is thoughtful and kind, approaches each day with a positive attitude, and is a joy to be around. As a family, we are deeply grateful to Sunmarke and its absolutely wonderful and caring teachers who are wonderful role models and truly embody the character strengths and wellbeing the school and its ethos of Positive Education espouse. Shereen Raggel Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú I have been truly impressed by my child‚Äôs learning at Sunmarke. However, this level of education is evident amongst his entire class. My child and his cohort‚Äôs depth of knowledge, innovative approach to problem-solving and thinking, and respectful nature have all impressed me. Each zone in the school is very well resourced, equipped both technologically and academically. Keep up the good work Sunmarke! Zaid Hassan Parent, Sunmarke School ‚Äú Sunmarke School is an across the board ‚ÄúOutstanding School‚Äù and provides an outstanding quality of education for all its pupils. BSO Inspection Report ‚Äú Sunmarke School is outstanding in almost all respects. Student‚Äôs learning skills are very strong. A significant key strength of the school is the outstanding wellbeing and personal development of all students. Vision, Values Inspiring Students to Thrive and Grow Every Day Our Vision ‚ÄòEmpowering young people through an innovative and character-building education that inspires them to thrive and achieve with purpose.‚Äô Our Mission ‚ÄòNurturing the next generation of changemakers for a better tomorrow.‚Äô Our Values We ASPIRE to uphold the following values: Accountability We believe in taking responsibility and leading by example Service We believe in helping colleagues, giving back to our community and serving society Purpose We believe in living a life of greater purpose and in making a positive impact on society Integrity We believe in upholding the highest standards of ethical conduct in thought, word and deed Respect We recognise our differences as well as our commonalities and believe in treating one another with courtesy and respect Excellence We strive to be the best we can be and in giving our 100% British Values As a British Schools Overseas (BSO) accredited school, Sunmarke School is committed to upholding the values and standards of a world-class British education. This includes a strong focus on the spiritual, moral, social and cultural development of our students, as well as the promotion of respect, tolerance, and responsibility. These principles align seamlessly with the values of the UAE, where respect for diversity and cultural understanding form the foundation of daily life. Together, these shared values shape our school community into one that is inclusive, aspirational, and globally minded. Rule of Law ‚Äì School policies, codes of conduct, and classroom expectations help pupils understand fairness, responsibility, and the importance of living within agreed rules, reflecting the laws of the UAE. Individual Liberty ‚Äì We encourage independence and student choice in learning, while ensuring safety and guidance so pupils understand the balance between rights and responsibilities. Mutual Respect ‚Äì Our Positive Education ethos, house system, and community partnerships promote kindness and respect in daily interactions across the school. Tolerance of Different Faiths and Beliefs ‚Äì We celebrate the UAE‚Äôs cultural and religious diversity, providing opportunities to learn about and respect different traditions while remaining rooted in our own values. Student Voice & Representation ‚Äì Pupils are given a voice through Student Council, Sports Leaders, and other leadership opportunities, ensuring they understand the importance of fairness, collaboration, and shared decision-making. Why Educate Your Child at Sunmarke? A Rigorous & Ambitious Education We offer rigorous, ambitious and holistic education emphasising academic excellence and participation in diverse extracurricular activities enabling children to achieve outstanding academic, social and personal success in a stimulating and supportive environment. Outstanding Senior Leaders & Teachers All our inspiring senior leaders, teachers and staff are trained in Positive Education and best practices in education, and are provided continuous professional development and training to keep abreast of the latest developments in pedagogy. Over Four Decades of History Built on the foundation of Fortes Education‚Äôs four decades of excellence in education, Sunmarke‚Äôs dynamic management team bring their rich experience and knowledge to deliver the best value-based education for students.

Performing Arts Programme Signature Programmes > Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Empowering Student Voice Through Creative Expression Programme Overview This dynamic programme blends drama, journalism, podcasting, public speaking, film, and media production into a powerful creative journey. Across all phases, students explore how storytelling, movement, voice, and technology can influence, inspire, and ignite change ‚Äî all while developing confidence and stage presence in Sunmarke‚Äôs world-class performing arts facilities. Who It‚Äôs For All students from EYFS to Year 13, with progressive exposure to theatre, communication, media production, and digital storytelling. Learning Journey EYFS & Years 1‚Äì2: Storytelling corners, mini-stages, puppetry, ‚ÄòShow and Tell‚Äô Years 3‚Äì6: Primary Drama, Junior Journalism Club, podcasting, performance poetry Years 7‚Äì9: Music and Drama, ensemble performance, student newspaper writing, public speaking Years 10‚Äì11: IGCSE/BTEC Creative Media, Sunmarke Newsroom, school podcast and radio productions. Years 12‚Äì13: IB Film / A-Level Media, extended podcasts, leadership communication projects Signature Techniques & Tools Voice & Persuasion: TED Talks, MUN, debates Audio & Broadcast: In-house podcasting studio, sound editing tools Written Communication: Blogs, opinion pieces, editorial writing Visual Storytelling: Film production, storyboard workshops, cinematography Stage & Screen: Annual theatre productions, skits, monologues, musical showcases Signature Experiences The Buzz Reporters editorial team Fortes Film Lab with coaching and equipment Speech Festivals and performance showcases Local internships with media houses and radio stations University masterclasses and industry panels Facilities 400-seat Sunmarke Auditorium Podcasting studio and media production suite Film editing lab and digital newsroom setup Black box Music lab Pathways & Progression Media, Journalism, Communications, Performing Arts university pathways Careers in media strategy, podcasting, digital content, stage direction, or public relations Assessment Models Coursework: Video projects, written publications, podcasts and creative portfolios Performance Review: Monologue and group presentation assessments Feedback Cycles: Peer reviews, professional critique panels, and self-evaluation Real-World Metrics: Podcast streams, article views, and theatre audience engagement Next Steps Join a student production, apply to the Buzz Reporters, or pitch your idea for a podcast or short film to the Media & Performing Arts team. Sunmarke School ‚Äì Where Amazing Happens It is with great pleasure that I welcome you to Sunmarke School, a place where tailored academic pathways, innovative Signature Programmes and a holistic approach to Positive Education converge to provide an outstanding educational experience for your child. At Sunmarke, we understand that every student is unique, with their own strengths, interests and aspirations. That is why we have developed a wide range of academic pathways that allow us to cater to the individual needs of every student. We are one of the very few schools to offer students the choice of A Level, IB Diploma, IB Career-related Programme and BTEC. By providing such enviable options and personalising learning experiences, we empower students to explore their passions and reach their full potential in a supportive and dynamic environment. One of our key areas of focus is Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Mathematics. Our STEAM and Design Thinking curriculum fosters creativity, critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Through hands-on projects, collaborative learning and exposure to real-world applications, Sunmarke students engage with virtual reality, learn how to code and develop the essential skills of tech literacy and digital fluency. As we prepare students for the future, we recognise the vital role that artificial intelligence (AI) plays in our society. We embrace AI, incorporating it into our curriculum and enabling learners to consider the limitless possibilities and ethical considerations associated with this transformative technology. Through our innovative AI programmes, students gain practical experience, develop computational thinking skills and become equipped to navigate the AI-driven world of tomorrow. Our other Signature Programmes provide further opportunities for Sunmarke students to explore their interests and talents in specialised areas. From Performing Arts, Media and Communication to the Global Language Academy and Environment and Sustainability (which includes the incredible Forest School), our signature offerings inspire students to delve deep into their passions, develop expertise and build a strong sense of compassion and social responsibility. At Sunmarke, we are extremely proud to offer a world-class, comprehensive Positive Education programme. We believe that academic success is intricately linked to emotional wellbeing, character development and the cultivation of positive relationships. Our PosEd framework fosters resilience, empathy and a growth mindset. Through mindfulness practices, character education and social-emotional learning, we enable all our students to thrive academically, emotionally and socially. I invite you to explore our website to learn more about our academic strengths, unrivalled Signature Programmes and Positive Education approach. We look forward to partnering with you in nurturing your child‚Äôs intellectual curiosity, fostering their passions and equipping them for the future. In joining Sunmarke, your family will become part of a forward-thinking, vibrant and welcoming community ‚ÄúWhere Amazing Happens‚Äù. Warm regards, Nicholas Rickford Principal

Sunmarke School is committed to upholding the values and standards of a world-class British education. This includes a strong focus on the spiritual, moral, social and cultural development of our students, as well as the promotion of respect, tolerance, and responsibility. These principles align seamlessly with the values of the UAE, where respect for diversity and cultural understanding form the foundation of daily life. Together, these shared values shape our school community into one that is inclusive, aspirational, and globally minded. Rule of Law ‚Äì School policies, codes of conduct, and classroom expectations help pupils understand fairness, responsibility, and the importance of living within agreed rules, reflecting the laws of the UAE. Individual Liberty ‚Äì We encourage independence and student choice in learning, while ensuring safety and guidance so pupils understand the balance between rights and responsibilities. Mutual Respect ‚Äì Our Positive Education ethos, house system, and community partnerships promote kindness and respect in daily interactions across the school. Tolerance of Different Faiths and Beliefs ‚Äì We celebrate the UAE‚Äôs cultural and religious diversity, providing opportunities to learn about and respect different traditions while remaining rooted in our own values. Student Voice & Representation ‚Äì Pupils are given a voice through Student Council, Sports Leaders, and other leadership opportunities, ensuring they understand the importance of fairness, collaboration, and shared decision-making. title: Sunmarke | Positive Education International School in Dubai
content: Sunmarke | Positive Education International School in Dubai Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login A Positive Education School About > A Positive Education School A Positive Education School A Philosophy Where Character Strengths Underpin Academic Excellence Truly outstanding education is not just about academic and personal achievements but also about the development of character, values, and wellbeing. This is the essence of Positive Education (PosEd). A scientifically-proven concept, PosEd is causing a paradigm shift in global education where parents, schools and governments realise the need to increase a child‚Äôs ‚Äòwellbeing‚Äô to raise his/her levels of ‚Äòachievement‚Äô. PosEd brings together the science of Positive Psychology combined with the best teaching practices to enable individuals, schools, and communities to flourish, be resilient, creative, successful and happy. Sunmarke ‚Äì A Character-Building School Multiple studies on the effects of PosEd testify that improved levels of a child‚Äôs wellbeing are associated with higher levels of academic engagement, social skills, optimism, behaviour, and fewer mental health-related issues. Positive Education ‚Äì Sunmarke‚Äôs DNA Positive Education (PosEd) is not an additional subject at Sunmarke but it‚Äôs woven into the fabric of the international school‚Äôs culture and is reflected in all its activities and teaching mechanisms. Sunmarke‚Äôs teachers undergo an intense training programme before entering the classroom where they learn, live, teach and embed Positive Education. This is what our teachers say about the Positive Education training they receive at Sunmarke: ‚ÄúWhere amazing happens. A motto that at first glance just appears to be some words to attract parents to send their children to Sunmarke school, almost like a gimmick. Over the past 3 days for me amazing did happen. The positive education training took me on a journey of self-discovery, showing me that changing my mindset can bring positive outcomes. I realized I have the power to make a difference in people‚Äôs lives. This training was the best I‚Äôve ever received from a school, as they genuinely cared about us, ensuring we could apply what we learned in teaching and at home. It was an incredible experience, especially since I used to dislike training due to its lack of usefulness. This was entirely different ‚Äì truly helpful, purposeful, and enlightening. It taught me to believe in the potential of education to inspire change.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe breadth of knowledge, evidence-based theories, outstanding coordination and delivery, and just everything about this week was outstanding! I was blown away in every way possible and feel so supported, valued, and appreciated.‚Äù The ‚ÄòFlourish‚Äô Model The 6 Key Skills Practised and Taught by Sunmarke Teachers for Students to Incorporate in Their Lives SUNMARKE'S WELLBEING & COUNSELLING TEAM Our PosEd and wellbeing approach fosters deep trust in our school community, creating a safe, welcoming and nurturing environment. We embed various initiatives into the daily routines, curriculum and extracurricular activities to establish a personal, social and academic support system each child needs to flourish. Class and Form Tutors, Heads of Year, and Subject teachers support students every day through direct teaching, mentoring, workshops and assemblies. The Counselling Department provides compassionate care for children who may require professional support and or simply a sympathetic listening ear. Students and parents both have access to a School Counsellor. A ‚ÄòWellbeing Champion‚Äô represents the school leadership in our Parent Association and ‚ÄòFriends of Sunmarke School‚Äô (FOSS) group while the popular monthly ‚ÄòWellness Wednesday‚Äô event raises awareness among parents about crucial topics like strength-based parenting, raising children in the digital age and health and nutrition. SUNMARKE'S SAFEGUARDING & CHILD PROTECTION TEAM Sunmarke has a designated Safeguarding and Child Protection Team with Child Protection Officers at every Key Stage in primary and secondary school. Click here for more information on our Safeguarding & Child Protection Team Safeguarding & Child Protection Policy We are also a certified school with the National Online Safety programme benchmarked to the best school safety standards in the UK. Please find more information about NOS here: https://nationalonlinesafety.com/

Our educators are commited to building character, wellbeing and values in a child, along with ensuring academic excellence with a strong belief in Sunmarke‚Äôs disruptively innovative approach to education. content: Sunmarke Leadership Team | British Curriculum School in Dubai Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Leadership About > Leadership Leadership At the heart of leadership is a desire to serve and a dedication to helping others become great. Sunmarke‚Äôs biggest strength is its passionate senior leadership team and faculty of teachers whose world-class experience in teaching, learning and administration has led the institution to be rated as one of the best schools in Dubai. Our educators are commited to building character, wellbeing and values in a child, along with ensuring academic excellence with a strong belief in Sunmarke‚Äôs disruptively innovative approach to education. The school is guided by a Board of Governors comprising teachers, senior leaders, and a Parents‚Äô Body who bring their rich professional experience, insight and advice to building one of the foremost British curriculum schools in Dubai. Sunmarke is further nurtured by a Board of Directors with over four decades of experience in school management. The Board supports the school‚Äôs growth by onboarding world-class senior leaders and teachers, and investing in up-to-date educational practices and facilities. Our educators hail from top-ranked universities in the UK. The Director of Fortes Education, Dr Neil Hopkin, the ex-principal at Sunmarke school is a globally renowned Principal and thought leader in education. Our senior leaders are nationally recognised education practitioners in the UK and our teachers have been associated with leading schools in the UK and elsewhere in the world. Outstanding exam results One of the few international schools in Dubai to offer both IB, A-Levels curriculum pathways and BTECs, Sunmarke consistently achieves ‚ÄòOutstanding‚Äô exam results year on year, a fact reflected in our scores at all levels as well as global university placements. Sunmarke is consistently recogonised among the best schools in Dubai thanks to its academic excellence. Our IBDP Results Our Excellent IBDP results for the academic year 2024 ‚Äì 25: 36.5 IBDP AVERAGE POINTS SCORE more than 6 points above the world average 90% students exceeding the world average 66% students exceeding 35+ points 28% more than one in four students achieved 40+ points Our A-Level & BTEC Results Our A-Level students go on to pursue courses at the top universities around the world. With a choice of 23 different subjects, Sunmarke‚Äôs Sixth Formers excel by choosing subjects that they are most passionate about with ample support from our teachers. Outstanding A-Level & BTEC results for the academic year 2024 ‚Äì 25: 100% student pass rate at A-Level & BTEC 97% A-LEVEL A*- C BTEC D*-M 78% A-LEVEL A*- B BTEC D*-D 53% A-LEVEL A*- A BTEC D* Our GCSE Results Our GSCE students experience a diverse and enriched curriculum that enables them to find success in their chosen careers. These results reflect the extraordinary accomplishments of each of our 25 GCSE subjects. Outstanding GCSE results in the academic year 2024-25: 100% student pass rate at GCSE 95% GCSE 9-4 (A*- C) including English & Maths 74% GCSE 9-6 (A*- B) 55% GCSE 9-7 (A*- A) Click to read Sunmarke Schools results mentioned on Which School Advisor , Edarabia .

content: Sunmarke Outstanding School | KHDA Inpection Report Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Inspection Reports About > Inspection Reports Inspection Reports Rated "OUTSTANDING" & "Very Good" - Recognition By BSO and KHDA British Schools Overseas Inspection Report 2023 ‚Äì Rated ‚ÄúOUTSTANDING‚Äù Sunmarke was rated ‚Äò Outstanding ‚Äô by the British Schools Overseas (BSO) inspection report of 2023. The BSO is an inspection agency that follows the framework and standards of the Department of Education (DfE) in the UK for National Curriculum schools. Click here to view our inspection report. KHDA Inspection Report 2023-24 ‚Äì Rated ‚ÄúVery Good‚Äù Sunmarke achieved ‚Äú Outstanding ‚Äù and ‚Äú Very Good ‚Äù ratings in the Knowledge and Human Development Agency (KHDA) and Dubai School Inspection Bureau (DSIB) Report (2023-2024) and received an overall ‚Äú Very Good ‚Äù. Click here to download the full report. 5 OUTSTANDING features the inspectors found in EVERY phase of Sunmarke School: Health and safety, including arrangements for child protection and safeguarding Care and support Students‚Äô personal development Social responsibility and innovation skills Understanding of Islamic values and awareness of Emirati and world cultures 10 AMAZING things the inspectors say about Sunmarke School: We are highly inclusive. We have a clear vision for ensuring the wellbeing of everyone, which is founded on Positive Education. We use rigorous policies, systems, and practices that ensure students‚Äô safety. We demonstrate mutual respect and open communication that contribute to a thriving leadership culture. We have premises which are of excellent quality and are meticulously maintained. We have outstanding resources to support teaching and learning. We use assessment well in lesson planning and gauge understanding through probing questioning. Sunmarke students demonstrate a strong sense of responsibility and independence; they interact with maturity and confidence. Sunmarke students are enthusiastic learners who have a well-developed sense of conservation and sustainability. Sunmarke parents actively contribute to the school and FOSS ensures community cohesion.

content: Sunmarke Outstanding School | KHDA Inpection Report Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Inspection Reports About > Inspection Reports Inspection Reports Rated "OUTSTANDING" & "Very Good" - Recognition By BSO and KHDA British Schools Overseas Inspection Report 2023 ‚Äì Rated ‚ÄúOUTSTANDING‚Äù Sunmarke was rated ‚Äò Outstanding ‚Äô by the British Schools Overseas (BSO) inspection report of 2023. The BSO is an inspection agency that follows the framework and standards of the Department of Education (DfE) in the UK for National Curriculum schools. Click here to view our inspection report. KHDA Inspection Report 2023-24 ‚Äì Rated ‚ÄúVery Good‚Äù Sunmarke achieved ‚Äú Outstanding ‚Äù and ‚Äú Very Good ‚Äù ratings in the Knowledge and Human Development Agency (KHDA) and Dubai School Inspection Bureau (DSIB) Report (2023-2024) and received an overall ‚Äú Very Good ‚Äù. Click here to download the full report. 5 OUTSTANDING features the inspectors found in EVERY phase of Sunmarke School: Health and safety, including arrangements for child protection and safeguarding Care and support Students‚Äô personal development Social responsibility and innovation skills Understanding of Islamic values and awareness of Emirati and world cultures 10 AMAZING things the inspectors say about Sunmarke School: We are highly inclusive. We have a clear vision for ensuring the wellbeing of everyone, which is founded on Positive Education. We use rigorous policies, systems, and practices that ensure students‚Äô safety. We demonstrate mutual respect and open communication that contribute to a thriving leadership culture. We have premises which are of excellent quality and are meticulously maintained. We have outstanding resources to support teaching and learning. We use assessment well in lesson planning and gauge understanding through probing questioning. Sunmarke students demonstrate a strong sense of responsibility and independence; they interact with maturity and confidence. Sunmarke students are enthusiastic learners who have a well-developed sense of conservation and sustainability. Sunmarke parents actively contribute to the school and FOSS ensures community cohesion.

title: Sunmarke School Achievements | British Curriculum School in Dubai
content: Sunmarke School Achievements | British Curriculum School in Dubai Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Our Achievements About > Our Achievements Student Achievements Making A Mark In Academics and Beyond Sunmarke students are encouraged to explore their potential and individuality to the maximum as they participate in activities which allow their talent to shine. Be it academics, sports or creative arts, our children excel in competitions with primary and secondary schools in the region. The World‚Äôs Best Debater Title Sunmarke student, Carlota Figueroa Ortiz, won the World‚Äôs Best Individual Debate title competing against 4,100 scholars from around the world. It was an astounding achievement for our talented scholar who displayed all qualities of a future leader. The Nikon Choice Award Winner Sixth Form student Ayusha Roy, received the Nikon Choice Award in the ‚ÄòLegacy of Zayed‚Äô Photography Competition 2018 for her work celebrating the timeless legacy of H.H. Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan and the impact he had on the UAE and its values. ‚ÄòOutstanding Pearson Learner Award‚Äô awarded to Sunmarke stars Sixth Formers, Abigail and Moiz received A* grades in Geography, Science and Statistics. Edexcel Pearson announced these students‚Äô qualification for the ‚ÄòOutstanding Pearson Learner Award 2017‚Äô in their subjects awarding them with the highest marks in the Middle East. School Awards & Recognitions Honours And Accolades For An Outstanding Institution Sunmarke School carries forward the legacy of excellence in education, established by Fortes Education. It is an honour and privilege for us to be recognised by distinguished platforms as we continue our incredible journey as one of the best international schools in Dubai. Each of these awards is a testament to the quality and dedication of our staff and students. Some of our awards and recognitions include: Schools Compared Sunmarke School has achieved remarkable recognition and distinction as a finalist in multiple prestigious categories at the Schools Compared Top School Awards. We take immense pride in being acknowledged as the ‚ÄòMost Innovative School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, the ‚ÄòBest Blended International Baccalaureate Curriculum School in the UAE 2023-24‚Äô, and the esteemed ‚ÄòBest Primary School Teacher of the Year 2023-24‚Äô. Furthermore, Sunmarke School‚Äôs exceptional performance has led to our selection as a shortlisted contender in various categories for the year 2023-24. These include the titles of ‚ÄòBest Blended International Baccalaureate School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, ‚ÄòBest British School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, ‚ÄòBest School for Post-16 Education in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, ‚ÄòBest School for Technical Stream Vocational Education in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, and ‚ÄòMost Innovative School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô. Notably, Sunmarke School‚Äôs accomplishments extend beyond recent years. We have previously been recognised as a finalist for the ‚ÄòBest New School Award‚Äô 2018-19, the esteemed ‚ÄòPost 16 Award‚Äô 2018-19, and the prestigious ‚ÄòBest Technical Education Award‚Äô 2018-19 at the Schoolscompared Top School Awards. The International School Awards Sunmarke was a finalist in The International School Awards 2019 in the ‚ÄòInitiative to Support Inclusion‚Äô category for our peer-coaching sports programme, Sports Heroes Academy. Mother, Baby & Child We also won three Mother, Baby & Child Awards for ‚ÄòBest New School‚Äô, ‚ÄòBrand of the Year‚Äô and also the Silver for ‚ÄòSecondary School of the Year‚Äô 2018.

Edexcel Pearson announced these students‚Äô qualification for the ‚ÄòOutstanding Pearson Learner Award 2017‚Äô in their subjects awarding them with the highest marks in the Middle East. School Awards & Recognitions Honours And Accolades For An Outstanding Institution Sunmarke School carries forward the legacy of excellence in education, established by Fortes Education. It is an honour and privilege for us to be recognised by distinguished platforms as we continue our incredible journey as one of the best international schools in Dubai. Each of these awards is a testament to the quality and dedication of our staff and students. Some of our awards and recognitions include: Schools Compared Sunmarke School has achieved remarkable recognition and distinction as a finalist in multiple prestigious categories at the Schools Compared Top School Awards. We take immense pride in being acknowledged as the ‚ÄòMost Innovative School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, the ‚ÄòBest Blended International Baccalaureate Curriculum School in the UAE 2023-24‚Äô, and the esteemed ‚ÄòBest Primary School Teacher of the Year 2023-24‚Äô. Furthermore, Sunmarke School‚Äôs exceptional performance has led to our selection as a shortlisted contender in various categories for the year 2023-24. These include the titles of ‚ÄòBest Blended International Baccalaureate School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, ‚ÄòBest British School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, ‚ÄòBest School for Post-16 Education in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, ‚ÄòBest School for Technical Stream Vocational Education in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô, and ‚ÄòMost Innovative School in the United Arab Emirates‚Äô. Notably, Sunmarke School‚Äôs accomplishments extend beyond recent years. We have previously been recognised as a finalist for the ‚ÄòBest New School Award‚Äô 2018-19, the esteemed ‚ÄòPost 16 Award‚Äô 2018-19, and the prestigious ‚ÄòBest Technical Education Award‚Äô 2018-19 at the Schoolscompared Top School Awards. The International School Awards Sunmarke was a finalist in The International School Awards 2019 in the ‚ÄòInitiative to Support Inclusion‚Äô category for our peer-coaching sports programme, Sports Heroes Academy. Mother, Baby & Child We also won three Mother, Baby & Child Awards for ‚ÄòBest New School‚Äô, ‚ÄòBrand of the Year‚Äô and also the Silver for ‚ÄòSecondary School of the Year‚Äô 2018.

title: Dylan Bishop(Class of 2019-20) Cardiff University - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai
content: Dylan Bishop(Class of 2019-20) Cardiff University - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Alumni > Dylan Bishop(Class of 2019-20) Cardiff University Hi, I‚Äôm Dylan Bishop, alumnus of Sunmarke School Dubai, and I‚Äôm thrilled to share my journey from my school days to where I am today. Attending Sunmarke from 2018 to 2020 was one of the most formative and exciting chapters of my life, and I‚Äôm forever grateful for the foundation it gave me. Achieving Excellence at Sunmarke I left Sunmarke with Straight A* and A grades in my A Levels and a BTEC Media Diploma. The combination of these qualifications equipped me with the skills and confidence I needed to take my next step: enrolling at Cardiff University. In 2020, I began studying Business Administration and Marketing, a course that perfectly matched my interests and ambitions. University Years and Beyond Graduating in 2023 with a 2:1 was a proud moment, marking the end of an incredible journey in the UK. But my heart was always drawn back to Dubai, so in the autumn of 2023, I returned home, eager to begin my career in the dynamic world of Business Development. Breaking into the Business World By November 2023, I had secured my first professional role as a Business Development Manager at KPS, a renowned interior fit-out and design company based in Dubai Design District. This opportunity has been nothing short of amazing. Every day, I learn something new‚Äîprocurement, logistics, pricing strategies, customer relations, and even brand identity. I feel incredibly fortunate to work in such a creative and fast-paced environment where I can apply everything I‚Äôve learned and continue to grow. Reflections on Sunmarke Looking back, what stands out most about my time at Sunmarke is the exceptional support I received from my teachers. They genuinely cared about my success and always encouraged me to aim high. The small class sizes made a huge difference too‚Äîit felt personal, like everyone was invested in my journey. The facilities were outstanding, and the sense of kindness and camaraderie among students and staff made it a joy to come to school every day. Advice for Current Sunmarke Students If I could give one piece of advice to students preparing to enter the professional world, it would be this: expect to learn a lot. The transition from school to the workplace is full of opportunities to grow and develop, so work hard, stay humble, and be grateful for every experience. Most importantly, never miss a chance to make something better‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs your work, a process, or even someone‚Äôs day. Looking Ahead As I look to the future, my ultimate goal is to grow into the role of CEO and lead a company to its greatest possible success. I‚Äôm passionate about watching businesses thrive, and I can‚Äôt wait to see where my journey takes me next. Thank You, Sunmarke Sunmarke School will always hold a special place in my heart. It‚Äôs where my ambitions were born, my skills were nurtured, and my path to success was set. Thank you for being the launchpad for my dreams‚ÄîI wouldn‚Äôt be where I am today without you. To all the students at Sunmarke now: the sky‚Äôs the limit. Dream big, work hard, and make every moment count. 0 Shares Prev Next Recent Blogs 28/11/2025 Career Readiness: Why It Matters for Students Today 21/11/2025 Expressive Art and Creativity in EYFS: Encouraging Self-Expression 14/11/2025 How Schools Can Lead the Way in Sustainable Practices 07/11/2025 The Rise of AI in Media: Opportunities for Young Creators 28/10/2025 Fortes Pro Sports Academy at Sunmarke: Nurturing the Next Generation of Student Athletes

content: Shambhavi Pradhan(Class of 2022-23) Humanitas University - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Alumni > Shambhavi Pradhan(Class of 2022-23) Humanitas University My name is Shambhavi Pradhan, and I am a proud alumnus of Sunmarke School, having graduated in 2023. I completed my A-Levels in Biology, Chemistry, and Maths, achieving an A* in all three subjects, an A in AS Level Psychology and an A in my Extended Project Qualification. I joined Sunmarke in 2021 at the start of Year 12 after completing my IB MYP exams at a previous school. My time at Sunmarke has been invaluable; the teachers were incredibly supportive, guiding me through everything from academic content to my EPQ and university applications. I also appreciated the numerous spaces within the school that allowed me to connect with friends and classmates. Currently, I am pursuing Medicine and Surgery at Humanitas University in Milan, Italy. My ultimate career goal is to specialize in a specific medical field, and I anticipate discovering my passion during my hospital rotations in my third year. To current Sunmarke students, I would say: As you transition into the professional world, remember that growth often comes with challenges. Initially, navigating independently can be tough, but it becomes easier with time. School is just the first chapter of your journey, but it‚Äôs a crucial one in achieving your aspirations. The lessons you learn now will pave the way for your future success. 0 Shares Prev Next Recent Blogs 28/11/2025 Career Readiness: Why It Matters for Students Today 21/11/2025 Expressive Art and Creativity in EYFS: Encouraging Self-Expression 14/11/2025 How Schools Can Lead the Way in Sustainable Practices 07/11/2025 The Rise of AI in Media: Opportunities for Young Creators 28/10/2025 Fortes Pro Sports Academy at Sunmarke: Nurturing the Next Generation of Student Athletes

title: Sara Abdel Ahad(Class of 2016-17) University of Exeter Graduate Engineer at Photon Energy - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai
content: Sara Abdel Ahad(Class of 2016-17) University of Exeter Graduate Engineer at Photon Energy - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login Alumni > Sara Abdel Ahad(Class of 2016-17) University of Exeter Graduate Engineer at Photon Energy My name is Sara Abdel Ahad and I am one of Sunmarke school‚Äôs alumni. I graduated from the school in 2017 after completing my Maths, Physics and Business A-Levels, achieving A*‚Äôs in all three subjects. This landed me an offer at the University of Exeter, studying MEng Renewable Energy Engineering on their Cornwall campus. At University, I spent the best 4 years of my life. I learnt all about solar, wind, tidal, and wave energy technologies which made me realise the importance of my degree for our future. This encouraged me to work as a student ambassador for the University, alongside my studies, to encourage other students to study STEM subjects. Living and studying in Cornwall has also been a unique experience as I was surrounded by greenery and the sea. After graduating from the University of Exeter with a First Class Honours in 2021, I was offered a job as a Graduate Engineer at Photon Energy in Reading, UK. I have recently been promoted to an Assistant Engineer, working on the design of commercial rooftop PV systems for large companies in the UK. I have been involved in some of the company‚Äôs biggest projects for large food distributors, going on site visits and assisting the delivery of the projects. One of my biggest achievements is the respect and trust I have earned from my colleagues and directors as a result of my hard work and commitment. Throughout my education and work experience, I have grown as an individual as I became more independent. This was influenced by the encouragement I received from my teachers at Sunmarke school who always believed in me and pushed me to apply to University in the UK. In the future, as I gain more experience, I would like to progress to become a project manager, working on large-scale rooftop and ground-mount PV systems around the World. If I could summarise the lessons I learnt throughout my adult life so far, I would emphasise the importance of believing in oneself and stepping outside the comfort zone because this is the only way to find our limits and accomplish our dreams. 0 Shares Next Recent Blogs 28/11/2025 Career Readiness: Why It Matters for Students Today 21/11/2025 Expressive Art and Creativity in EYFS: Encouraging Self-Expression 14/11/2025 How Schools Can Lead the Way in Sustainable Practices 07/11/2025 The Rise of AI in Media: Opportunities for Young Creators 28/10/2025 Fortes Pro Sports Academy at Sunmarke: Nurturing the Next Generation of Student Athletes

On our wellbeing page you will find articles, guided practices and information on varied subjects that will help you on your own wellness journey. FOR OUR STUDENTS School, studies, friendships, and relationships can be exciting, enjoyable, overwhelming, and stressful. It is incredibly important to take care of yourself physically through mindful eating, exercising, and getting enough sleep, as well as mentally from a social and emotional perspective. These mindful colouring sheets can be used as calming activities with you and your family DISCOVER MORE Try these breathing and brain break activities DISCOVER MORE FOR OUR PARENTS We understand that sometimes it takes a community to get it right. To ensure that our students have a comprehensive support system, we have compiled some helpful links and resources that will guide you in assisting your children with the various challenges they encounter, as well as the crucial practice of self-care. This resource aids children in expressing and recognising their emotions DISCOVER MORE This resource provides top tips when supporting children with anxiety DISCOVER MORE FOR OUR STAFF As educators and caretakers, the responsibility of health is not limited to others, it is as important to pay attention to your own physical, social and emotional wellbeing. Here are 6 exercises to try that will increase your positive emotions and wellbeing DISCOVER MORE Experience the power of gratitude. Download your own Gratitude Journal DISCOVER MORE Try this simple technique that takes just a few minutes, it can help an agitated student regain the state of mind needed for learning DISCOVER MORE Contacting The Wellbeing Team The Wellbeing Team at Sunmarke School are always here to assist you. Reach out to them by ‚Äò Contacting School Department ‚Äô and select your child‚Äôs name. The designated Wellbeing Department (EYFS/ Primary/ Secondary) for your child will then appear in the drop down menu, please type your message and submit. A member of the Wellbeing team will be in touch with you to see how they can best support you and your family.

title: Inclusion - Sunmarke School Dubai | National Curriculum of England
content: Inclusion - Sunmarke School Dubai | National Curriculum of England Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login About Principal‚Äôs Message Mission, Vision, Values A Positive Education School Leadership Academic Results Inspection Reports Our Achievements Sunmarke Alumni Wellbeing The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Our Campus Learning Nursery Our Approach Enriched Learning EYFS Our Approach Early Years Curriculum Enriched Learning Primary Our Approach Primary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Student Council and Ambassadors Secondary Our Approach Secondary Curriculum Sports & PE Creative & Performing Arts Enriched Learning Coding Sunmarke Mini MBA Student Council and Ambassadors Sixth Form Our Approach A-Levels BTECs IB Diploma Programme (IBDP) Student Enrichment Coding CIVITAS Careers Counsellor Student Leadership Signature Programmes STEAM & Design Thinking Environment & Sustainability University & Career Readiness Programme Fortes Pro Sports Academy Positive Education Global Language Academy Financial Literacy Programme Enterprise & Mini-MBA Programme Communications, Media & the Performing Arts Programme Admissions Apply Online Schedule a Visit Tuition Fees Scholarships Re-enrol Online School Forms FAQs For Parents School Uniform School Timings Academic Calendar School Events Calendar Policies Transport Services Dining & Catering Sports Hub Parent Engagement Governance Committee Activities Sunmarke Free Extracurricular Activities (ECAs) Sunmarke Paid Extracurricular Activities Third-Party Paid Extracurricular Activities News & Events Weekly Buzz Blog Press Podcasts Contact Us Work With Us Apply Visit Enquire VLE Login The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department About > The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department The Achievement Centre ‚Äì Inclusion Department Making Learning Accessible To All Inclusivity is enshrined in Sunmarke‚Äôs ethos where we welcome a diverse range of learners from EYFS to Secondary. The Achievement Centre takes the lead in providing an inclusive education to students in close collaboration with parents, teachers and external specialists. ‚Äú Jayne West Head Of Inclusion Laila is a Global Ambassador representing sports for People of Determination worldwide. She was an outstanding member of the Secondary Life Skills Class, where she gained the qualifications to be accepted into Dubai College of Leisure and Tourism further education course. We are all very proud of her as she continues to inspire our students to believe in the dream!!! To facilitate the successful participation and progress of all learners, a range of additional provisions, subject to staffing and availability, are offered at no extra cost. They include, but are not limited to: Interventions for literacy Interventions for mathematics Speaking and listening Social skills Motor skills Directed studies Extra-curricular activities specific to students with SEND (Special Educational Needs & Disabilities) Commitment to Inclusion Our school is also an accredited centre for the BTEC Introductory Awards offering a wide range of both academic and vocational units including Business Administration, Media, Health and Fitness, Leisure and Hospitality. It has a highly successful SEND department which has been commended in our most recent DSIB (Dubai School Inspection Bureau) inspection. We have developed a reliable network of external providers, who parents can contract to provide specialist assessment and therapy services at Sunmarke. These include, but are not limited to: Comprehensive developmental and diagnostic assessment Psycho-educational assessment Behavioural assessment and intervention Occupational Therapy and Sensory Integration assessment and intervention Speech and Language Therapy assessment and intervention Personalised support from a 1:1 Learning Support Assistant Fortes English Language Programme The Fortes English Language Programme is an intensive programme of cross curricular, full immersion pedagogy, with a focus on academic English, alongside every day language and culture. Students learn language alongside new skills and all within a broad range of subjects and activities such as Art, Drama, PE and Sport, Music in addition to the usual core subjects. Students experience accelerated language acquisition and achieve a deeper understanding of subject-specific English across the curriculum. For more information about inclusion at Sunmarke, please download our Inclusion Policies and Inclusion Procedures below: Inclusion Policy Inclusion & Students of Determination Procedures Dubai Inclusive Education Policy Framework UN Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and Optional Protocol Federal Law No. (29) of 2006 Concerning the Rights of People of Determination Dubai Inclusive Education Policy Framework 2017 Implementing the Education Policy Framework Dubai Inclusive Education Policy Framework 2017 (Arabic) Implementing the Education Policy Framework (Arabic) Advocating for inclusive education ‚Äì A GUIDE FOR PARENTS Law No. (2) of 2014 Concerning Protection of the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in the Emirate of Dubai
